EmailTemplate.name: EDU Webinar Winner Notice.Winner Announcement
EmailTemplate.subject: Congratulations, Tom: Jabba's Palace Is Yours.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Congrats, Tom! The Winner, You Are. Dear Tom, Thank you for attending VMTurbo's EDU webinar. As you know, you were entered to win a LEGO STAR WARSTM Jabba's Palace upon registering, and we have great news. You won! Please click the link below to contact Jenny Sharpe <mailto:jennifer.sharpe@vmturbo.com> at VMTurbo, who will coordinate shipping your Palace. Congratulations, sir! Claim Your Palace <mailto:jennifer.sharpe@vmturbo.com> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
